home.title: Classic Mini DIY | Your Friendly Neighborhood Classic Mini Resource
home.description: Classic Mini DIY - Your complete resource for Classic Mini restoration, maintenance, and modification. DIY tutorials, technical guides, and community support.

mission.title: THE MINI MISSION
mission.heading: Keeping the Classics on the Road
mission.content: Classic Mini DIY started out of my small driveway workshop in 2015. I always focus on two things: keeping your Classic Mini on the road and making DIY car work accessible for all skill levels. I make DIY videos and tutorials showing exactly how to complete a wide range of jobs on your Classic Mini. I also partner with world-class manufacturers to deliver top-of-the-line products to personalize and ensure the performance of your Classic Mini.

support.title: SUPPORT THE MISSION
support.heading: Support
support.content: Classic Mini DIY is supported by our viewers. If you are interested in helping to keep the channel alive, consider supporting on Patreon or if you have skills in JS and modern web technologies, please consider supporting the open source codebase on github.

toolbox.title: THE COMPLETELY FREE
toolbox.heading: Classic Mini Toolbox
toolbox.subtitle: THE TOOLKIT FOR THE DIY MECHANIC
toolbox.content: One of the largest reasons for starting this channel, was about making infromation related to working your Mini Cooper more accessible. In service to this goal I have created the Classic Mini Toolbox. Combining information from all over the web to bring you one location to find anything you need.

patreon.title: SUPPORT THE CHANNEL
patreon.heading: Become a Patreon
patreon.content: Classic Mini DIY is completely free resource supported by our viewers. If you are interested in helping to keep the channel alive, consider supporting on Patreon.

about.title: About Me
about.name: MY NAME IS COLE
about.bio: I am a {age}-year-old Web Developer working in the financial industry. My experience in the automotive industry comes from 2 years of training on heavy diesel machinery and 8 years of Classic Mini ownership. With this experience, I do my best to provide the most comprehensive and technically correct information I can.
about.promise: I will provide you with all the knowledge I can to the best of my ability. I will also accept feedback in the event that I get something incorrect. I am an enthusiast and not a complete expert so from time to time I will make mistakes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Classic Mini DIY
privacy.description: Classic Mini DIY privacy policy regarding data collection, storage, and use of YouTube API Services. Learn how we protect your information.
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.acceptance_content: By using our API client, you agree to be bound by the
privacy.accessibility_content: This Privacy Policy is easily accessible to all users via
privacy.youtube_api_content: Our API client uses YouTube API Services. By using our API client, you agree to the collection, storage, and usage of your data as described in this policy.
privacy.data_collection_content: We collect data directly from your device to provide and improve our services. This includes information about your device, IP address, and public cookie information. We do not collect any additional personal data for our use. This data is stored securely and used to enhance the user experience and ensure the smooth operation of our API client. In addition no data is stored on our servers, and thus is deleted each time you close your browser.
privacy.data_processing_content: We process your data to provide our services. Your data may be shared with internal and external parties for the purpose of improving and maintaining our API client. We ensure all external parties comply with our strict data protection guidelines.
privacy.data_methods_content: Data is collected through various means such as direct input, cookies, and other tracking technologies. This helps us to understand user preferences and provide better service.
privacy.contact_content: Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us at

seo.title: Classic Mini ECU Maps | Tuning Files for Multiple ECUs | Classic Mini DIY
seo.description: Download professionally tuned ECU maps for Classic Mini engines. Compatible with Haltech, Speeduino, MegaSquirt, Emerald, and more. Pay what you want for lifetime updates.
seo.keywords: Classic Mini ECU maps, Mini Cooper tuning, Haltech maps, Speeduino maps, MegaSquirt maps, Emerald ECU, engine tuning, fuel maps, ignition maps
seo.ogTitle: Classic Mini ECU Maps | Tuning Files for Multiple ECUs
seo.twitterTitle: Classic Mini ECU Maps | Multiple ECU Support
seo.twitterDescription: Professional ECU maps for Classic Mini engines with lifetime updates.

maps.description: After years of tuning Classic Mini engines, building custom harnesses, and mapping multiple ECU's, I am proud to release my collection of ECU maps with two options for access. Offering support for many popular ECU's used on Classic Minis, with more added in the future.

purchase.title: Option 1 - Purchase
purchase.description: Purchase the ECU maps directly from the Classic Mini DIY store. This option is perfect for those who want to support the channel and get the maps without having to use Github. This option also comes with priority support via email.

download.title: Option 2 - Download
download.description: Download the ECU maps directly from Github. This option is perfect for those who want to get the maps for free. This option also comes with the ability to contribute to the project by submitting pull requests.

index.main_heading: The Classic Mini DIY Wheel Dictionary
index.description_text: Looking for that one wheel you saw the other day online but you just cant quite find? That's where the Wheel Dictionary comes in. You can now search for the right wheel for your Classic Mini Cooper. With about 1,000 wheels and growing, we hope you'll be able to find exactly the wheel you are looking for.

Using the same data from the now retired site, www.wheeldictionary.net you can search for the right wheel for your Classic Mini Cooper. With lots wheels in the library and growing, we hope you'll be able to find exactly the wheel you are looking for.

technical.title: Classic Mini Technical Toolbox | DIY Calculators & Specifications
technical.description: Classic Mini technical tools and specifications for DIY mechanics. Access calculators, torque specs, needle charts, and more to maintain and upgrade your Mini.
technical.keywords: Classic Mini technical tools, Mini Cooper specifications, SU needle chart, compression calculator, torque specs, DIY Mini maintenance, technical reference
technical.ogTitle: Classic Mini Technical Toolbox | DIY Calculators & Specifications
technical.ogDescription: Classic Mini technical tools and specifications for DIY mechanics. Access calculators, torque specs, needle charts, and more to maintain and upgrade your Mini.
technical.twitterDescription: DIY technical tools and specifications for Classic Mini maintenance and upgrades.

structured_data.name: Classic Mini Technical Toolbox
structured_data.description: Collection of technical tools, calculators, and specifications for Classic Mini maintenance and upgrades.

technical.welcome_text: One of the most important parts of Classic Mini DIY is the focus on getting out and working on your own car. So to make this easier for you, I have collected technical information from various sources and consolidated it right here on classicminidiy.com. These tools and calculators will help you maintain, upgrade, and troubleshoot your Classic Mini with confidence. From compression ratios to needle charts, everything you need is at your fingertips.
technical.description_text: One of the most important parts of Classic Mini DIY is the focus on getting out and working on your own car. So to make this easier for you, I have collected technical information from various sources and consolidated it right here on classicminidiy.com. These tools and calculators will help you maintain, upgrade, and troubleshoot your Classic Mini with confidence. From compression ratios to needle charts, everything you need is at your fingertips.

torque.description: Complete torque specifications for Classic Mini fasteners. Reference chart for engine, suspension, drivetrain, and body fasteners with values in lb/ft and Nm.

needles.title: SU Needles Chart & Comparison Tool | Classic Mini DIY
needles.description: Compare SU carburettor needles for your Classic Mini with our interactive chart. Find the right needle profile for your engine build with this comprehensive comparison tool.
needles.keywords: SU needles, carburettor needles, Classic Mini, needle comparison, SU carburettor, needle profiles, Mini Cooper
needles.og_title: SU Needles Chart & Comparison Tool | Classic Mini DIY
needles.og_description: Compare SU carburettor needles for your Classic Mini with our interactive chart. Find the right needle profile for your engine build.
needles.twitter_title: SU Needles Chart & Comparison Tool | Classic Mini DIY
needles.twitter_description: Compare SU carburettor needles for your Classic Mini with our interactive chart.
needles.description_text: One of the most confusing things about working on your Classic Mini often is the carburettor needle used on your car. Below you will find a multi-needle comparison chart which will allow you to compare needle profiles of multiple SU needles at the same time. Choose the needles you would like to compare and click Compare which will redraw the chart with new profiles. A huge thank you to the mintylamb site for posting this information publically.

structured_data.name: How to Compare SU Carburettor Needles
structured_data.description: Compare different SU carburettor needles to find the right profile for your Classic Mini engine build.

select_needles.name: Select Needles
select_needles.text: Start typing the name of the needles you would like to compare in the dropdown menu.

add_to_comparison.name: Add to Comparison
add_to_comparison.text: Click the "Add Needle" button to add the selected needle to the comparison chart.

view_comparison.name: View Comparison
view_comparison.text: The chart will automatically update to show the profiles of all selected needles for comparison.

ui.find_needle_heading: Find the needle for your carb

gearing.description: Planning your next gearbox build? Use our brand new gearbox gearing calculator to generate information for your Classic Mini's gearbox refurb or upgrade.

gearing.twitter_description: Planning your next gearbox build? Use our brand new gearbox gearing calculator to generate information for your Classic Mini's gearbox refurb or upgrade.
gearing.description_text: When building or rebuilding a gearbox, updaing your gear ratios, or changing out your speedometer sometimes you need to update some things. Using the Classic Mini DIY Gear Calculator below, you can determine the correct gearing for your for your new engine build and find the right speedo gear to use as well.

engine_decoder.title: Tech - Mini Engine Plate Decoder
engine_decoder.description: Decode your Classic Mini's Engine plate to determine the engine size and features of your car. This plate is located in the same place across all mini generations and is used to identify the engine size and features.
engine_decoder.og_description: Decode your Classic Mini's Engine plate to determine the engine size and features of your car. This plate is located in the same place across all mini generations and is used to identify the engine size and features.
engine_decoder.twitter_description: Decode your Classic Mini's Engine plate to determine the engine size and features of your car.
engine_decoder.description_text: The engine plate is a series of numbers and letters that are stamped on a metal plate that is riveted to the engine near the water pump. This plate is located in the same place across all mini generations and is used to identify the engine size and features.

chassis_decoder_card.heading: Need to decode your Chassis Number?
chassis_decoder_card.description: Click here to identify your car using our new chassis number decoding tool.

clearance.description: Detailed clearance specifications can be found online right here at Classic Mini DIY.
clearance.og_description: Detailed clearance specifications for the Classic Mini can be found online right here at Classic Mini DIY.
clearance.twitter_description: Detailed clearance specifications for the Classic Mini can be found online right here at Classic Mini DIY.

chassis_decoder.title: Tech - Mini Chassis Plate Decoder
chassis_decoder.description: Decode your Classic Mini's chassis plate to determine the model year, assembly plant, and sequential build number of the car. The chassis plate is also known as the VIN plate, VIN tag, or VIN plate depending on the generation.
chassis_decoder.og_description: Decode your Classic Mini's chassis plate to determine the model year, assembly plant, and sequential build number of the car. The chassis plate is also known as the VIN plate, VIN tag, or VIN plate depending on the generation.
chassis_decoder.twitter_description: Decode your Classic Mini's chassis plate to determine the model year, assembly plant, and sequential build number of the car.
chassis_decoder.description_text: The chassis plate is a series of numbers and letters that are stamped on a metal plate that is riveted to the body of the car. This plate is located in different places across all mini generations and is used to identify the model year, assembly plant, and sequential build number of the car. The chassis plate is also known as the VIN plate, VIN tag, or VIN plate depending on the generation.

engine_decoder_card.heading: Engine Decoder
engine_decoder_card.description: Click here to identify your engine using our new engine number decoding table.

form.card_description: Enter your chassis number and select the appropriate year range to decode all the details automatically.
form.error_decode_failed: Failed to decode chassis number. Please try again.

special_notes.title: Special Notes
special_notes.build_number_text: The first car at Longbridge was number 101, as was the first at Cowley. From then on, each factory continued with their own number sequence regardless of the model; e.g., Saloon, Van, etc. In other words, each model did not start at 101 and maintain its own sequence. Saloons and Vans, etc., are mixed in the number sequence along with the Cooper and Cooper S models
special_notes.assembly_plant_text: This seems to be used inconsistently on English-built cars, and it is understood that the car was built at the "normal" factory if the letter is left off; e.g., an Austin, Riley or Wolseley at Longbridge may or may not have an "A" after the sequence number. Yes, there were Austin Minis built at the Morris plant in Cowley and Morris Minis built at the Austin plant in Longbridge. Note that all English-built Cooper and Cooper S models (Austin and Morris) as well as Riley Elf and Wolseley Hornet models were built at the Longbridge, Austin plant

attribution.text: Please note the above details were pulled from
attribution.technical_articles: technical articles. More Details can be found here:

contact.title: Contact Classic Mini DIY - Get Help & Submit Content
contact.description: Contact Classic Mini DIY for general inquiries, archive submissions, technical contributions, or bug reports. Multiple ways to get in touch with our community.
contact.general_inquiries_description: Questions about the site, Classic Mini ownership, or general help? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.ai_chat_description: Use the chat widget for quick questions
contact.archive_submissions_description: Have historical documents, photos, or stories to share? Help preserve Classic Mini history.
contact.what_to_include_description: Photos, documents, stories, or historical info
contact.rights_attribution_description: Please confirm you own or have permission to share
contact.technical_submissions_description: Share repair guides, technical specs, or maintenance tips with the community.
contact.content_types_description: Repair guides, specs, tips, part numbers
contact.credit_description: We'll credit you as the contributor
contact.bug_reports_description: Found a problem with the site? Help us fix it by reporting bugs and issues.

chat.title: CMDIY Assistant - Classic Mini DIY
chat.description: Chat with our AI assistant for Classic Mini technical help, chassis decoding, parts information, and restoration guidance.
chat.og_description: Get instant help with your Classic Mini projects from our AI assistant.
chat.twitter_description: Get instant help with your Classic Mini projects from our AI assistant.
chat.description_text: Your Classic Mini DIY assistant - ask technical questions, find parts information, and get guidance on restoration projects. Or just chat with me about your Classic Mini!
